mapper.insert: insert into product_info values(#{mk_idx}, #{mk_product_id}, #{mk_product_name}, #{mk_product_price}, #{mk_product_discount_price}, #{mk_product_category}, #{mk_product_type}, #{mk_original_thumb}, #{mk_stored_thumb}, #{mk_thumb_size}, #{mk_status}, #{mk_content}, #{mk_original_upfile}, #{mk_stored_upfile}, #{mk_upfile_size}, #{mk_inventory}, now(), now(), 10, 20, #{mk_writer_ip});
mapper.select: select * from product_info as a LEFT JOIN product_sort as b on a.mk_product_type = b.ps_sort_id LEFT JOIN product_category as c on a.mk_product_category = c.pc_category_id order by a.mk_idx desc;
select * from product_info as pr_info join product_sort as pr_sort on pr_info.mk_product_type = pr_sort.ps_sort_id where pr_info.mk_idx = #{mk_idx} order by pr_info.mk_idx desc;
